params.validationID: ID of the validation period associated with the validator

returns._0: Weight of the validator. If the validation ID does not exist, the weight will be 0.

params.nodeID: ID of the node associated with the validation ID

resendUpdateDelegation(bytes32).details: Resending the latest validator weight with the latest nonce is safe because all weight changes are cumulative, so the latest weight change will always include the weight change for any added delegators.

WARP_MESSENGER().notice: Warp precompile used for sending and receiving Warp messages.

getValidator(bytes32).notice: Returns a validator registered to the given validationID

getWeight(bytes32).notice: Returns the validator's weight. This weight is not guaranteed to be known by the P-Chain

registeredValidators(bytes).notice: Returns a validation ID registered to the given nodeID

valueToWeight(uint256).notice: Converts a token value to a weight.

weightToValue(uint64).notice: Converts a weight to a token value.
